about_the_game:
～～～A CHALLENGE FOR YOU～～～


Welcome to the enchanting world of polyrhythms!
We thought nobody could beat this rhythm game, but the rhythm game gods proved us wrong and crushed it! So we’ve cranked up the volume and quality, and it’s back with a vengeance!
Can you conquer this rhythm? Bring it on!



It’s a simple game where all you have to do is press the corresponding key the moment a circle reaches a vertex of a shape!
Well... the number of shapes will gradually increase, though...



Stage select offers even more complex modes like Rest Mode and Offbeat Mode for those looking for a challenge.
Compete with your friends and see who has the best rhythm in the rankings!

name: Polylylyrhythm
short_description: The much-talked-about "Polyrhythm" on social media has finally been officially released! Can you handle the 3/4, 5/4, 7/4... and all those crazy polyrhythms!? It’s simple yet incredibly challenging! A new kind of rhythm game is here! Come and test your rhythm skills in this beat-pounding madness!
